<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Watch This!](/Feats.aspx?ID=4140) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 79 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=248), [Pirate](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=70) (Level 6)

**Prerequisites**
[Duelist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1956) or [Pirate Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2032)

**Access**
Members of the Firebrands at the rank of second mark or higher have access to this feat.

**Trigger**
An ally misses or critically misses an enemy you can see with their attack.

</column>

---

A common saying among Firebrands is, “There's always a fool who thinks they can do it better—and they're often right.” You verbally commit to using an action on your next turn to make a melee Strike against the same enemy your ally has missed. If your attack hits, you deal additional damage equal to twice the number of damage dice.
